heading: About Magnum BI
description:
With over 20 years of experience in building inspection, Magnum BI provides comprehensive, professional inspection services across the Sunshine Coast. Our detailed reports help you make informed decisions about your property investments.

We pride ourselves on thorough inspections, rapid turnaround times, and clear communication. Every inspection is conducted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring you have all the information you need.

features.description: Decades of expertise in building inspection and construction assessment
Fast scheduling to meet your timeline requirements
Comprehensive digital reports delivered within 48 hours
Intimate knowledge of Sunshine Coast building standards and conditions
